mapper.sql: ID AS "id", ENT_NAME AS "entName", ENT_CERT_TYPE AS "entCertType", ENT_CERT_NUM AS "entCertNum", RPT_DATE AS "rptDate", SHEET_YEAR AS "sheetYear", SHEET_TYPE AS "sheetType", SHEET_TYPE_DIVIDE AS "sheetTypeDivide", AUDIT_FIRM_NAME AS "auditFirmName", AUDITOR_NAME AS "auditorName", AUDIT_TIME AS "auditTime", CIMOC AS "cimoc", PRT_DATE_CODE AS "prtDateCode", REVENUE_OF_SALES AS "revenueOfSales", COST_OF_SALES AS "costOfSales", BUSINESS_AND_OTHER_TAXES AS "businessAndOtherTaxes", SELLING_EXPENSES AS "sellingExpenses", GENERAL_AND_ADMINISTRATIVE_EXP AS "generalAndAdministrativeExp", FINANCIAL_EXPENSE AS "financialExpense", IMPAIRMENT_LOSS_OF_ASSETS AS "impairmentLossOfAssets", POLAFCIFV AS "polafcifv", INVESTMENT_INCOME AS "investmentIncome", IIFABACE AS "iifabace", OPERATING_PROFITS AS "operatingProfits", NON_OPERATING_INCOME AS "nonOperatingIncome", NON_OPERATING_EXPENSES AS "nonOperatingExpenses", NON_CURRENT_ASSETS AS "nonCurrentAssets", PROFIT_BEFORE_TAX AS "profitBeforeTax", INCOME_TAX_EXPENSE AS "incomeTaxExpense", NET_PROFIT AS "netProfit", BASIC_EARNINGS_PER_SHARE AS "basicEarningsPerShare", DILUTED_EARNINGS_PER_SHARE AS "dilutedEarningsPerShare", STATUS AS "status", CREATE_USER AS "createUser", CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", UPDATE_USER AS "updateUser", UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime", DELETE_FLAG AS "deleteFlag"
mapper.select:
select
from FINANCE_INCOME_STATEMENT07_FB order by create_time DESC
